docs.text: Rules Tools Character creating https://character.pf2.tools/ set 'PROFICIENCY' to 'NO LEVEL' add 'ADJUSTMENT': 'AUTOMATIC BONUS PROGRESSION' ATTACK +0 ITEM SKILLNAME +0 ITEM DAMAGEDICE +0 ITEM AC +0 ITEM PERCEPTION +0 ITEM SAVES +0 ITEM Variant Rules Proficiency without Level Gradual Ability Boosts Automatic Bonus Progression Homebrew Rules Disarm , Escape , Grapple , Shove , Trip is agile . Defender gets lesser cover from attack if a line drawn between the center of defender space and the center of attacker space pass through space occupied with any creature. Creature's size must be equal or larger than defender. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum. Donec vitae suscipit est.
